Reason: The 'gc_warn_threshold_in_ms' configuration option is not performance-sensitive. This is because setting a threshold for logging GC pauses at WARN level does not directly and substantially affect system performance at the system level. The configuration does not involve any time-extensive or memory-extensive operations within its related code that would lead to notable performance variations. It is more of a monitoring and management tool for GC pauses, rather than a configuration that significantly impacts system performance.
